name: Run Python Script

on:
  push:
    branches:
      - main  # This will trigger the workflow on pushes to the main branch
  workflow_dispatch:  # Allows manual triggering of the workflow

jobs:
  run-python-script:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest  # The environment for running the workflow

    steps:
    - name: Checkout Code
      uses: actions/checkout@v3  # Checks out your repository's code

    - name: Set up Python
      uses: actions/setup-python@v4  # Sets up a Python environment
      with:
        python-version: '3.x'  # Specify your required Python version

    - name: Install Dependencies
      run: |
        python -m pip install --upgrade pip
        pip install -r requirements.txt  # Ensure you have a requirements.txt file

    - name: Run Python Script
      env:
        GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS: ${{ secrets.GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS }}
      run: python REPO_GCP_INTEGRATION.py  # Replace this with your script name

    - name: Upload to BigQuery
      run: echo "Upload process completed!"
